item.title: Kim Kardashian's The System: The Case of Kevin Keith - Episode 8 - Motion
item.description: Voice Over 00:02 The System contains adult content and may not be suitable for all audiences. Listener discretion is advised. Kim Kardashian 00:08 I was driving down the street and I was taking my kids to a drive thru Starbucks on Topanga. And at the gas station on the left, there was a man being arrested, handcuffed and like, thrown on the front of his car being handcuffed. My daughter said, oh, my gosh, look, you know, and my son, they were all looking out the window and they said, what did he do?

item.title: Kim Kardashian's The System: The Case of Kevin Keith - Episode 7 - Shadow Of A Doubt
item.description: VO 00:00 The System contains adult content and may not be suitable for all audiences. Listener discretion is advised. Kim Kardashian 00:10 Last episode we talked about the Pharmacy Burglary Ring, the informants involved with that investigation, including Rudell Chatman, and the threat that was recorded in the Pharmacy Burglary Report, the one from Rodney Melton where he reportedly told an informant he was paid $15,000 to cripple the man responsible for the drug raids.

item.title: Kim Kardashian's The System: The Case of Kevin Keith - Episode 6 - Puzzle Pieces
item.description: VO 00:00 The system contains adult content and may not be suitable for all audiences. Listener discretion is advised. Kim Kardashian 00:11 I’ll be the first to admit that this case can be confusing. There’s so many players here. So I want to remind you what we’ve heard so far. In the months leading up to the Bucyrus estates murders, there was a pharmacy burglary ring operating in Ohio. Pharmacies were being broken into and the stolen drugs were being sold.

item.title: Kim Kardashian's The System: The Case of Kevin Keith - Episode 5 - The Ring
item.description: Disclaimer 00:00 The System contains adult content and may not be suitable for all audiences. Listener discretion is advised. News Clip 00:12 30 year old Kevin Keith was arrested at his home in Crestline, halfway between Bucyrus and Mansfield by both of those police departments. Police were led to him by the partial imprint of a license plate number left in a snowbank after the getaway car ran into it, as it left the scene of the crime.

item.title: Kim Kardashian's The System: The Case of Kevin Keith - Episode 4 - Getaway Car
item.description: Disclaimer 00:00 The System contains adult content and may not be suitable for all audiences. Listener discretion is advised. Tonya Strong 00:17 Is there anything you can say right now in your own defense? Kevin Keith 00:20 I did not harm anyone and I love kids. I would never do that to nobody’s kids. Never. I did not do this crime. Michael Corwin 00:28 See here, who’s this? Quanita Reeves 00:28 Daddy’s friend.

item.title: Kim Kardashian's The System: The Case of Kevin Keith - Episode 3 - Number Five
item.description: Disclaimer 00:00 The System contains adult content and may not be suitable for all audiences. Listener discretion is advised. Tonya Strong 00:13 Kevin, you’re accused of heinous crimes, aggravated murder and attempted murder. Children were shot and one was killed. Did you do this? Kevin Keith 00:28 No I didn’t Tonya. I love kids. Kim Kardashian 00:33 This is from an interview between Kevin Keith and Tonya Strong at News Four.

item.title: Kim Kardashian's The System: The Case of Kevin Keith - Episode 2 - The Night Of
item.description: VO 00:00 The System contains adult content and may not be suitable for all audiences. Listener discretion is advised. Kevin Keith 00:06 The time I got arrested, I was home ,watching TV, my fiance, she was mingling around the house and she said she looked out the window and she said she saw a bunch of police officers. So I was headed actually towards the door to open the door, was when they kicked it in.

item.title: Kim Kardashian's The System: The Case of Kevin Keith - Episode 1 - Life & Death
item.description: Voice Over 00:00 The System contains adult content and may not be suitable for all audiences. Listener discretion is advised. Police Tape 01:08 Scene of a homicide at 1712 B Marion Road. In the living room are two shell casings. In this room, we have shards of glass. We have a blood spot on the floor, blood spots all over in front of the door. We enter the living room area.
